channel.title: Connection error retrying in
channel.description: Hi when i run my creativescape client (shard), it says connection error retrying in 5...4...3..2...1 and then it keeps doing it again. Please tell me what i did wrong or maybe i put my cache in the wrong place? :confused: your help will be appreciated
